code: import{connect}from'react-redux';import DeleteShopItem from'../Components/DeleteShopItem';import{removeShopItem as _removeShopItem}from'../redux/actions/deleteShopItem';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{user:state.user};};var mapStateToDispatch=function mapStateToDispatch(dispatch){return{removeShopItem:function removeShopItem(user,pass,itemId){return dispatch(_removeShopItem(user,pass,itemId));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapStateToDispatch)(DeleteShopItem);
